title: Urban Development Activities in Colombo and Adjoining Areas Housing Development Programme for underserved settlements - Award of contact for the construction of 1777 Housing Units
decision_details: - the proposal made by H.E. the President, to award the contract for the construction of 1777 Housing Units at Orugodawatte, in a block of land identified by the  Urban Development Authority,  as recommended by the Cabinet Appointed Negotiating Committee (CANC), was approved by the Cabinet.
